entities.name: ragnuk the first
entities.description: Ragnuk the First is mentioned as the original owner of the sword, taken from him by Godric Gryffindor. (Chapter 25)

entities.name: godric gryﬃndor
entities.description: Godric Gryffindor is mentioned as the one who took the sword from Ragnuk the First. (Chapter 25)

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who is present in the scene and has a connection to the sword. (Chapter 25)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters who is discussing the sword with Griphook. (Chapter 25)

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character who is present in the scene and has an opinion about the sword. (Chapter 25)

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character who is also present in the scene and is being consulted by Harry about the sword's history. (Chapter 25)

relationships.description: Griphook has a connection to Ragnuk the First, as he is trying to get back the sword that was taken from him. (Chapter 25)
Godric Gryffindor took the sword from Ragnuk the First, as mentioned by Griphook. (Chapter 25)
Harry is discussing the sword with Griphook, trying to figure out what to do next. (Chapter 25)
Ron agrees with Harry that they should not let Griphook have the sword. (Chapter 25)
